DOC.brief_title: Novel Scalable Internet Supplemented Weight Loss Treatment Primary Care
DOC.detailed_description: Overweight obese participant recruit local primary care office . This study test effectiveness motivational interview nutritional counseling weight loss . The treatment supplement internet support .
DOC.criteria: BMI 2555 Daily access internet phone Recruited local primary care office . Age 1865 Coexisting physical and/or psychiatric condition require significant treatment ( e.g. , bipolar disorder , psychotic illness ) , and/or require intensive treatment hospitalization ( e.g. , suicidality , severe mood disorder ) Meets criteria current substance abuse/dependence Currently receive psychiatric , psychological , behavioral , pharmacologic treatment know affect weight eat Pregnant , breastfeeding , plan become pregnant treatment period Cardiac disease , include ischemic heart disease , congestive heart failure , conduction abnormality , history heart attack Serious neurologic illness ( e.g. , seizure history ) medical illness ( e.g. , impaired hepatic renal function ) Uncontrolled diabetes , thyroid condition , hypertension
